## IPlotConfig interface

Defines the configuration for the chart.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPlotConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [annotations?](./plot.iplotconfig.annotations.md) | [IAnnotationStyles](./chart-def.iannotationstyles.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Named styles that can be applied to annotations. |
|  [chartType?](./plot.iplotconfig.charttype.md) | [ChartType](./chart-def.charttype.md) \| [ChartTypeString](./chart-def.charttypestring.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of chart to render. Default to "line". |
|  [dataLabels?](./plot.iplotconfig.datalabels.md) | [IDataLabels](./chart-def.idatalabels.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configure data labels for the whole chart. |
|  [height?](./plot.iplotconfig.height.md) | number \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the height of the plot. Default to 600 pixels. |
|  [legend?](./plot.iplotconfig.legend.md) | [ILegendConfig](./chart-def.ilegendconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configures the chart's legend. |
|  [width?](./plot.iplotconfig.width.md) | number \| string | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the width of the plot. Default to 800 pixels. |
|  [x?](./plot.iplotconfig.x.md) | [IXAxisConfig](./plot.ixaxisconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configures the x axis. |
|  [y?](./plot.iplotconfig.y.md) | [IYAxisConfig](./plot.iyaxisconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configures the y axis. |
|  [y2?](./plot.iplotconfig.y2.md) | [IYAxisConfig](./plot.iyaxisconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Configures the second y axis. |
